text: At this time, @WHO considers that the benefits of the #AstraZeneca #vaccine outweigh its risks and recommends that #vaccinations continue. #ONLYTogether #VaccineForAll #VAccineRollOutSA Full statement on AstraZeneca #COVID19 vaccine safety signals: 👉 https://t.co/XIhVVpWKJd https://t.co/KtvJor9sDl
